product_name: Sawyer Stay-Put System 2 Sunscreen SPF 50 - 1 fl. oz.
long_description: Sawyer Stay-Put(R) System 2 SPF 50 sunscreen offers sweat-resistant protection for all your active adventures. Formula is designed to absorb well into skin to provide long-lasting protection. Sawyer Stay-Put System 2 SPF 50 sunscreen is enriched with aloe vera and vitamins. 1 oz. container is perfect for travel and taking on the trail.
short_description: Sawyer Stay-Put(R) System 2 SPF 50 sunscreen offers sweat-resistant protection for all your active adventures.
